00020 typedef std::map<std::string, int> StateMap;
00021 
00022 UserControl::UserControl(PlayManager* playManager) : Controller(playManager)
00023 {
00024     m_control = m_playManager->manager.app->globalSettings.control;
00025     m_eventManager = m_playManager->manager.app->GetEventMng();
00026 }

00032 void UserControl::SetActionStateDown(std::string name, bool state)
00033 {
00034     StateMap::iterator kit = m_control.keyboard.find(name);
00035     StateMap::iterator mit = m_control.mouse.find(name);
00036 
00037     if(kit != m_control.keyboard.end())
00038         m_eventManager->keyState[kit->second] = state;
00039 
00040     else if(mit != m_control.mouse.end())
00041         m_eventManager->mouseState[mit->second] = state;
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool UserControl::IsActionJustUp(std::string name)
00045 {
00046     StateMap::iterator kit = m_control.keyboard.find(name);
00047     StateMap::iterator mit = m_control.mouse.find(name);
00048 
00049     if(kit != m_control.keyboard.end())
00050         return m_eventManager->lastActiveKey.first == kit->second
00051             && m_eventManager->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_UP;
00052 
00053     else if(mit != m_control.mouse.end())
00054         return m_eventManager->lastActiveMouse.first == mit->second
00055             && m_eventManager->notify == EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_UP;
00056 
00057     else
00058         return false;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool UserControl::IsActionJustDown(std::string name)
00062 {
00063     StateMap::iterator kit = m_control.keyboard.find(name);
00064     StateMap::iterator mit = m_control.mouse.find(name);
00065 
00066     if(kit != m_control.keyboard.end())
00067         return m_eventManager->lastActiveKey.first == kit->second
00068             && m_eventManager->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN;
00069 
00070     else if(mit != m_control.mouse.end())
00071         return m_eventManager->lastActiveMouse.first == mit->second
00072             && m_eventManager->notify == EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_DOWN;
00073 
00074     else
00075         return false;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool UserControl::IsActionStateDown(std::string name)
00079 {
00080     StateMap::iterator kit = m_control.keyboard.find(name);
00081     StateMap::iterator mit = m_control.mouse.find(name);
00082 
00083     if(kit != m_control.keyboard.end())
00084         return m_eventManager->keyState[kit->second];
00085 
00086     else if(mit != m_control.mouse.end())
00087         return m_eventManager->mouseState[mit->second];
00088 
00089     else
00090         return false;
00091 }

00093 inline bool playerCanJump(scene::NewtonNode* node1, scene::NewtonNode* node2)
00094 {
00095     Vector3f contact, normal, penetration;
00096 
00097     int contactPoint = NewtonCollisionCollide(node1->GetParallelScene()->GetNewtonWorld(), 1,
00098                                               NewtonBodyGetCollision(node1->GetBody()), node1->GetMatrix(),
00099                                               NewtonBodyGetCollision(node2->GetBody()), node2->GetMatrix(),
00100                                               contact, normal, penetration, 0);
00101 
00102     return (contactPoint > 0 && Vector3f::Dot(normal, Vector3f(0, 1, 0)) > 0.25);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void UserControl::Process(Player* player)
00106 {
00107     scene::Camera* playerCam = m_playManager->manager.scene->GetCurCamera();
00108 
00109     bool collideWithStatic = false;
00110 
00111     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_playManager->map.staticObjects.size(); i++)
00112         if(playerCanJump(player->GetPhysicBody(), m_playManager->map.staticObjects[i]->GetPhysicBody()))
00113         {
00114             collideWithStatic = true;
00115             break;
00116         }
00117 
00118     // Move
00119     Vector3f addForce;
00120 
00121     if(IsActionStateDown("forward"))
00122         addForce += playerCam->GetTarget() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00123     if(IsActionStateDown("backward"))
00124         addForce -= playerCam->GetTarget() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00125     if(IsActionStateDown("strafLeft"))
00126         addForce += playerCam->GetLeft() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00127     if(IsActionStateDown("strafRight"))
00128         addForce -= playerCam->GetLeft() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00129 
00130     addForce.y = 0;
00131 
00132     player->GetPhysicBody()->SetApplyForce(addForce);
00133 
00134     // Jump
00135     if(collideWithStatic)
00136         if(IsActionStateDown("jump"))
00137             player->Jump();
00138 
00139     // Boost
00140     if(IsActionStateDown("boost"))
00141         player->Boost();
00142 
00143     // Change weapons
00144     if(IsActionStateDown("switchUpWeapon"))
00145         player->SwitchUpWeapon();
00146 
00147     if(IsActionStateDown("switchDownWeapon"))
00148         player->SwitchDownWeapon();
00149 
00150     // Shoot
00151     if(IsActionStateDown("shoot"))
00152         player->Shoot(m_playManager->GetShootTarget());
00153 
00154     BulletTime* btim = m_playManager->GetBullettime();
00155 
00156     // Bullettime
00157     if(IsActionJustDown("bullettime"))
00158         btim->SetActive(true);
00159 
00160     else if(IsActionJustUp("bullettime"))
00161         btim->SetActive(false);
00162 }
